name: Leena AI
headline: We at Leena AI build a virtual assistant that answers employee's√¢¬Ä¬¶
description:
HR/IT/Finance professionals spend 50% of their time answering employees' questions and tickets. It√¢¬Ä¬ôs even worse on the employee side, they have to wait for a long time for simple answers.

We are live with 500 customers like Coca-Cola, Sony, Puma, Vodafone, Nestle, P&G, Airbnb, etc. We have raised over $40M from top VCs like Bessemer, Greycroft, Elad Gil, etc.

Leena AI consumes company√¢¬Ä¬ôs enterprise knowledge & starts answering all employee questions just like a human would. It can even answer complex personalized questions like Why is my salary less this month?

Employees can access Leena AI from commonly used UIs like MS Teams or Slack.
tags: industry:artificial-intelligence; industry:generative-ai; industry:chatbot; industry:enterprise-software; industry:ai-assistant; location:san-francisco-bay-area

## We use cookies!
Hi, this website uses essential cookies to ensure its proper operation and tracking cookies to understand how you interact with it. The latter will be set only after consent. Let me choose
Accept allReject all
## Cookie Settings
Cookie usage üì¢
We use cookies to ensure the basic functionalities of the website and to enhance your online experience. You can choose for each category to opt-in/out whenever you want. For more details relative to cookies and other sensitive data, please read the full [cookies policy](https://www.leena.ai/</cookie-policy>).
Strictly necessary cookiesStrictly necessary cookies
These cookies are essential for the proper functioning of my website. Without these cookies, the website would not work properly
Performance and Analytics cookiesPerformance and Analytics cookies
These cookies allow the website to remember the choices you have made in the past
Advertisement and Targeting cookiesAdvertisement and Targeting cookies
These cookies collect information about how you use the website, which pages you visited and which links you clicked on. All of the data is anonymized and cannot be used to identify you
More information
For any queries in relation to our policy on cookies and your choices, please [contact us](https://www.leena.ai/</contact-us>).
Accept allReject allSave settings

generated_description:
### Leena AI: Revolutionizing Employee Support with AI

**Overview**  
Leena AI is a cutting-edge virtual assistant designed to streamline employee queries in organizations, specifically in the sectors of HR, IT, and Finance. Founded in the Y Combinator Batch S18, the company started with a simple mission: to save employees from the frustration of waiting for simple answers to their questions. With a remarkable presence that includes heavyweights like Coca-Cola, Sony, and Airbnb among its 500 customers, Leena AI has raised over $40 million from prominent venture capital firms, including Bessemer and Greycroft.

**The Problem**  
Traditionally, HR, IT, and Finance professionals spend about 50% of their time addressing employee inquiries and managing tickets. For employees, waiting for needed information can be time-consuming and tedious. Leena AI tackles this issue head-on by providing instant responses to employee questions, creating a more efficient workflow and improving the overall employee experience.

**How It Works**  
Leena AI's technology consumes a company‚Äôs enterprise knowledge, enabling it to respond to queries in a manner similar to that of a human. For instance, it can handle specialized questions like "Why is my salary less this month?"‚Äîproviding tailored responses that meet individual employee needs. 

Employees can engage with Leena AI via popular platforms like MS Teams and Slack‚Äîan integration that enhances usability and ease of access.

**Location and Team**  
Based in Redwood City, CA, Leena AI boasts a strong team of 500 employees working towards transforming enterprise communication and efficiency.

**Product Offerings and Unique Features**  
- **Agentic AI**: Central to Leena AI's offerings is its Agentic AI technology that allows for a significant 70% self-service guarantee for IT, HR, and Finance tickets. 
- **Multi-channel Support**: The assistant seamlessly integrates with existing employee communication channels, ensuring help is just a click away.
- **Multilingual Support**: Leena AI caters to diverse teams by offering support in over 100 languages.
- **Autonomous Agent**: The newest innovation allows for complex task management across multiple applications with just one prompt, streamlining processes that were previously disjointed.

**Security and Compliance**  
Understanding the importance of data security, Leena AI complies with EU AI Act standards and ensures that customer data is never used to train its models, promoting trust among its users.

**Recognition**  
The company has received accolades from industry leaders, appearing in Gartner's Hype Cycle reports and being recognized in several categories including Virtual Support Agents and AI Applications for IT Service Management.

**Conclusion**  
In a world where efficiency is crucial, Leena AI stands out as a robust solution for organizations looking to enhance their employee experience. With continuous innovations and a strong commitment to security and user satisfaction, Leena AI is not just simplifying processes; it‚Äôs transforming how companies engage with their employees.

For more information, visit [Leena AI](https://www.leena.ai).
